overview: For all the wrong Bona did to his younger brother Daniel, he still made peace and forgave him. Daniel wants peace to prevail between his brother and the community so he decided to have a reconciliation party for them. Bona's friend Ekwedike advised him against having the party because he believed his brother is a ritualist. Where does this insinuation lead them? [parts 3-4 of De Prof]
tagline: For the first time in your life you have spoken reasonably.
title: Big Man Brother
